textOpeningDesc: Eco‑friendly electric taxi rides, fast and safe — all in one app.
servicesHeaderDesc: AdeGreenTaxi delivers safe, fast, and eco‑friendly electric taxi rides designed for your everyday mobility.

services.title: Eco-Friendly Rides
services.desc: Enjoy environmentally friendly journeys with energy-efficient vehicles.

services.title: Taxi Anywhere
services.desc: Fast and safe transportation to your destination anytime.

services.title: Secure Payments
services.desc: Safe and flexible digital payments directly from the app.

services.title: 24/7 Availability
services.desc: Service ready to assist you whenever you need.

extras.title: Guaranteed Safety
extras.desc: Every ride is equipped with high safety standards for passenger comfort.

extras.title: Sustainability
extras.desc: Reduce carbon footprint with our eco-friendly electric fleet.

extras.title: Customer Support
extras.desc: Our team is ready to assist you anytime through the app.
